description: A long, deep vertical scratch is visible on the right side of the front apron.
evidence: Clearly visible in the close-up image of the front apron and seat.

description: Multiple faint scratches are present on the wooden seat surface.
evidence: Visible upon close inspection of the seat in multiple images.

description: Several scuff marks and indentations are located midway up the front left leg.
evidence: Clearly shown in a dedicated close-up image of the leg.

description: A noticeable horizontal scratch is present on the left side apron.
evidence: Visible in the close-up image showing the connection between the leg and the seat frame.

description: A cluster of minor scratches and scuffs on the front-facing side of the front right leg.
evidence: Visible in a close-up image of the leg.

description: Scuff marks and light scratches are visible on the top edge of the backrest.
evidence: Shown in the close-up image of the upper part of the chair.
